text:
I don’t know why this is so hard just to give him his present
Message 3085 of 4024
You’re really difficult to work with as a coparent to be honest..In this thread alone, you said yes,
• I could bring him his present, and now you’resaying I can’t just drop it off for him
• You would turn voice calls on for emergency and urgent situations, you haven’t
Please put yourself in my shoes for a moment . You’ve taken my kids completely. I’m trying my very best to be cooperative with you and healthy.
Please help.
Sent:06/09/2024 at 04:49 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/09/2024 at 04:50 PM)
Subject:Re: Basketball today
Message 3086 of 4024
You asked for one thing. I said that worked.
Then you pivoted and pushed for more. When I said no, you make it into a big deal, then act like I’m the issue.
That’s the same with the calls.
I’m stepping away because this will get into a back and forth that is a waste of time and energy.
Sent:06/09/2024 at 04:52 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/09/2024 at 04:53 PM)
Subject:Re: Basketball today
Message 3087 of 4024
I’ve asked for two simple things that you already said yes to. And it sounds like you’re going to poke at me by refusing both now and say you’re
stepping away.
Please don’t make it impossible to coparent with you
